Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.colorconvert

Class ColorSpaceImageNExtWrapper

Object
ColorSpace
ColorSpaceImageN
ColorSpaceImageNExt
ColorSpaceImageNExtWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColorSpaceJAIExtWrapper
public class ColorSpaceImageNExtWrapper extends ColorSpaceImageNExt
This class is used for wrapping ColorSpaceImageN instances into ColorSpaceImageNExt ones.
Author:
Nicola Lagomarsini geosolutions
